rules.natural: Whenever the agent obtains evidence illegally, it follows that the court does not admit evidence.
Whenever the agent intends to test the suspect, the agent conducts a test on the suspect.

Under the condition that the agent has a warrant, if it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, then the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.
Either the agent has a warrant or the agent has probable cause.

If the agent has probable cause, then, provided that it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.
If the agent follows procedure, then the court upholds the conviction.
Whenever it is not the case that obtaining evidence illegally by the agent implies the court admits evidence, the court dismisses the case.

If it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, then the agent does not make an arrest of the suspect.
Provided that the agent does not follow procedure, the agent obtains evidence illegally.
Whenever the court does not uphold the conviction, the agent possesses alcohol.

facts.natural: The agent has a breathalyzer tool.
The agent intends to test the suspect.
The court does not dismiss the case.

steps.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.
If the agent conducts a test on the suspect, then, provided that the agent has a breathalyzer tool, whenever the suspect is a person, the agent does not possess alcohol.
If the agent intends to test the suspect, then, whenever the agent has a breathalyzer tool, under the condition that the suspect is a person, the agent does not possess alcohol.
Under the condition that the agent has a breathalyzer tool, if the suspect is a person, then the agent does not possess alcohol.
Provided that the suspect is a person, the agent does not possess alcohol.
The agent does not possess alcohol.
If the agent obtains evidence illegally, then the court admits evidence.
It is not the case that the agent obtains evidence illegally.

natural_facts.A3: The agent has a breathalyzer tool.
natural_facts.A4: The agent intends to test the suspect.
natural_facts.A5: The agent conducts a test on the suspect.
natural_facts.A6: The agent makes an arrest of the suspect.

Either the agent has a warrant or the agent has probable cause.

If the agent has probable cause, then, provided that it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.
If the agent follows procedure, then the court upholds the conviction.
Whenever it is not the case that obtaining evidence illegally by the agent implies the court admits evidence, the court dismisses the case.

Under the condition that it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.

If it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, then the agent does not make an arrest of the suspect.
Provided that the agent does not follow procedure, the agent obtains evidence illegally.
Whenever the court does not uphold the conviction, the agent possesses alcohol.
The suspect is a person.
The agent has a breathalyzer tool.
The agent intends to test the suspect.
The agent follows procedure.
The court upholds the conviction.

(A10 → A11).natural: If the agent obtains evidence illegally, then the court admits evidence.

(A10 → ¬A11).natural: Whenever the agent obtains evidence illegally, it follows that the court does not admit evidence.

(A2 → ¬A1).natural: Provided that the suspect is a person, the agent does not possess alcohol.

(A3 → (A2 → ¬A1)).natural: Under the condition that the agent has a breathalyzer tool, if the suspect is a person, then the agent does not possess alcohol.

(A4 → (A3 → (A2 → ¬A1))).natural: If the agent intends to test the suspect, then, whenever the agent has a breathalyzer tool, under the condition that the suspect is a person, the agent does not possess alcohol.

(A4 → A5).natural: Whenever the agent intends to test the suspect, the agent conducts a test on the suspect.

(A5 → (A3 → (A2 → ¬A1))).natural: If the agent conducts a test on the suspect, then, provided that the agent has a breathalyzer tool, whenever the suspect is a person, the agent does not possess alcohol.

(A7 → (¬(A5 → (A3 → (A2 → ¬A1))) → A6)).natural: Under the condition that the agent has a warrant, if it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, then the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Either the agent has a warrant or the agent has probable cause.

(A8 → (¬(A5 → (A3 → (A2 → ¬A1))) → A6)).natural: If the agent has probable cause, then, provided that it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.

(A9 → G).natural: If the agent follows procedure, then the court upholds the conviction.

(¬(A10 → A11) → A12).natural: Whenever it is not the case that obtaining evidence illegally by the agent implies the court admits evidence, the court dismisses the case.

(¬(A5 → (A3 → (A2 → ¬A1))) → A6).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, the agent makes an arrest of the suspect.

(¬(A5 → (A3 → (A2 → ¬A1))) → ¬A6).natural: If it is not the case that conducting a test on the suspect implies that having a breathalyzer tool leads to the suspect being a person implying the agent does not possess alcohol, then the agent does not make an arrest of the suspect.

(¬A9 → A10).natural: Provided that the agent does not follow procedure, the agent obtains evidence illegally.

(¬G → A1).natural: Whenever the court does not uphold the conviction, the agent possesses alcohol.

A3.natural: The agent has a breathalyzer tool.

A4.natural: The agent intends to test the suspect.

¬A1.natural: The agent does not possess alcohol.

¬A10.natural: It is not the case that the agent obtains evidence illegally.

¬A12.natural: The court does not dismiss the case.
